mflorea - (13:26): sdumitriu: I'm trying to get a CSSStyleDeclaration object (i.e. the style object) from a w3c.dom.Element . First I tried casting to ElementCSSInlineStyle but it seems that xerces's ElementImpl doesn't implement this interface. Then I tried to parse the value of the style attribute with http://cssparser.sourceforge.net/ but I get an empty style object.. and CSS4j works only with DOM4j afaics. Any hints?  
mflorea - (13:31): cssparser is almost undocumented  
sdumitriu - (13:32): Sorry, can't help you with that without going into the code  
mflorea - (13:33): np, I tried to look over the code myself but the parser code seems to be automatically generated from a grammar  
mflorea - (13:33): I'll dig further, thanks anyway
